sentences.sanskrit: XVI. atha ṣoḍaśodhyāyaḥ. (daivāsurasaṃpadvibhāgayogaḥ) śrībhagavān uvāca abhayaṃ sattvasaṃśuddhir jñānayogavyavasthitiḥ dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam
ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā bhavanti saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijātasya bhārata
dambho darpobhimānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca ajñānaṃ cābhijātasya pārtha saṃpadam āsurīm
daivī saṃpad vimokṣāya nibandhāyāsurī matā mā śucaḥ saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijātosi pāṇḍava
dvau bhūtasargau lokesmin daiva āsura eva ca daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu
pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate
asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram aparasparasaṃbhūtaṃ kim anyat kāmahaitukam
etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya naṣṭātmānolpabuddhayaḥ prabhavanty ugrakarmāṇaḥ kṣayāya jagatohitāḥ
kāmam āśritya duṣpūraṃ dambhamānamadānvitāḥ mohād gṛhītvāsadgrāhān pravartanteśucivratāḥ 1
cintām aparimeyāṃ ca pralayāntām upāśritāḥ kāmopabhogaparamā etāvad iti niścitāḥ 1
āśāpāśaśatair baddhāḥ kāmakrodhaparāyaṇāḥ īhante kāmabhogārtham anyāyenārthasaṃcayān 1
idam adya mayā labdham imaṃ prāpsye manoratham idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam 1
asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api īśvaro.aham ahaṃ bhogī siddhohaṃ balavān sukhī 1
āḍhyobhijanavān asmi konyosti sadṛśo mayā yakṣye dāsyāmi modiṣya ity ajñānavimohitāḥ 1
anekacittavibhrāntā mohajālasamāvṛtāḥ prasaktāḥ kāmabhogeṣu patanti narakeśucau 1
ātmasaṃbhāvitāḥ stabdhā dhanamānamadānvitāḥ yajante nāmayajñais te dambhenāvidhipūrvakam 1
ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ mām ātmaparadeheṣu pradviṣantobhyasūyakāḥ 1
tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krurān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu 1
āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmanijanmani mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim 1
trividhaṃ narakasyedaṃ dvāraṃ nāśanam ātmanaḥ kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet 1
etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamodvārais tribhir naraḥ ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim 1
yaḥ śāstravidhim utsṛjya vartate kāmakārataḥ na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim 1
tasmāc chāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ te kāryākāryavyavasthitau jñātvā śāstravidhānoktaṃ karma kartum ihārhasi 1
